name: Modern Family (Season 5)
info:
• 中文名: 摩登家庭 第五季
  • 放送星期: 星期三
  • 集数: 24
  • 开始: 2013-09-25
  • 结束: 2014-05-21
  • 类型: 喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 频道: ABC
  • 官方网站: http://abc.go.com/shows/modern-family
  • imdb_id: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2911820
  • wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modern_Family_(season_5)

eps.name: Suddenly, Last Summer
eps.desc: As gay marriage is legalized in California, Mitch and Cam plan their perfect proposals, not realizing that the other has something planned. Cam calls for the help of Jay and Gloria and Mitch rallies Claire and Phil to help make their evening perfect.

eps.name: First Days
eps.desc: It's Manny and Luke's first day at high school and both Phil and Gloria don't want to let their sons go. Confiding in each other, Phil and Gloria end up as extras in a commercial. Elsewhere, Claire joins Jay's company and Cam subs as Alex's history teacher, who both have teething issues in their new positions.

eps.name: Larry's Wife
eps.desc: Cam and Mitch start planning their wedding; Lily is worried about her cat, Larry, who didn't come home for days; Phil have a new target group of clients; and Gloria is worried about little Joe being evil after some things he did.

eps.name: Farm Strong
eps.desc: Cam's sister Pam (guest star by Dana Powell) comes for a visit and Cam and Mitch struggle on how to tell her they are getting married; Phil and Claire skip Luke's soccer game while Gloria has issues to admit that she needs reading glasses.

eps.name: The Late Show
eps.desc: Jay has made reservations for the whole family at a new restaurant that he has waited to go to for months. However, everyone seems to be running late: Gloria takes forever to get ready, Claire becomes paranoid about letting Luke stay home alone and Cam and Mitch fight after they both wear the same outfit. Elsewhere, Alex babysits Lily; and Hayley spends the night with Manny and Joe.

eps.name: The Help
eps.desc: Gloria tries to find a new nanny for little Joe and ends up hiring a male nanny — something that Jay and Manny don't like; Phil's dad, Frank, stays with the them for a while after his break up; Cam and Mitch ask their friend Pepper to plan their wedding.

eps.name: A Fair to Remember
eps.desc: The whole family heads to the school fair where everyone gets something to do while Haley stays back home to enjoy Jay and Gloria's pool and the sun.

eps.name: ClosetCon '13
eps.desc: Claire and Jay attend a Closet Convention; Phil discovers what Jay is hiding in his secret closet; Mitch and Cam visit Cam's birthplace.

eps.name: The Big Game
eps.desc: Cam gets ready to coach an important football game that could break a record, but his intensity blocks out the fact that the other team is at a disadvantage while Mitchell tries to quit his job. Phil tries to sell a house and Claire doesn't want her father's help at work.

eps.name: The Old Man & the Tree
eps.desc: Jay takes Manny out to cut down their own Christmas tree, and Gloria is on edge with mum in town, but changes her tune when she sees her bonding with Claire. Elsewhere, Mitchell is forced to do last minute shopping when they didn't get Lily the right gift, and Cameron takes Lily to a charity event where they experience the true meaning of Christmas.

eps.name: And One to Grow On
eps.desc: Phil tricks Luke into taking a dance class, but the jokes on him when the white lie indirectly lands him in the slammer. Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria are throwing birthday parties for both Manny and Joe and are concerned Manny might be going for girls out of his league, and Mitch and Cam get a rude awakening in the cutthroat world of booking a wedding venue

eps.name: Under Pressure
eps.desc: Claire suffers from pressure during the high school open house, while Jay teaches Phil how to play hookie. Gloria butts heads with Manny's schoolmate's mom (Jane Krakowski), Mitch meets his new neighbor (Jesse Eisenberg) and Alex goes to see a therapist.

eps.name: Three Dinners
eps.desc:
Phil and Claire take Haley out to dinner to discuss her future, but she manages to turn the tables. Jay’s friend Shorty and wife Darlene are back visiting, and they have some news that doesn’t sit well with Jay. Mitch and Cam decide to have a nice romantic dinner date, where they don’t talk about the wedding or about Lily which leads to a lot of awkward silences.
Absent: Ariel Winter as Alex, Nolan Gould as Luke, and Aubrey Anderson-Emmons as Lily

eps.name: iSpy
eps.desc: Claire and Phil try to spy on Luke to see where he is going while they ask Alex to spy on Haley and learn about the photograph exhibition Haley is taking part in. Mitch tries to hide a piece of gossip from Cam but he doesn't have much success while Gloria thinks that Jay was dreaming about another woman in his sleep.

eps.name: The Feud
eps.desc: Phil and Jay discover that Luke wrestles against Gil Thorp's own son. Claire catches lice from Lilly after Mitch and Cam didn't warn her when she was picking-her up at school. Haley and Alex battle with a possum. Manny is ashamed of Gloria's presence at a museum class trip.

eps.name: Spring-a-Ding-Fling
eps.desc:
Much to her chagrin, Haley has to accompany Phil at a realtor's banquet. Cam feels excluded when a popular Spanish teacher returns and has to call Claire for help. Luke and Alex have dates. Mitch misinterprests his new boss's signs. Gloria and Jay babysit Lilly.

Absent: Rico Rodriguez as Manny

eps.name: Other People's Children
eps.desc: Jay decides to initiate Luke into bricolage. Meanwhile, Claire and Gloria help Lilly choose a flower girl dress for her fathers' wedding. Cam, Mitch, Alex and Manny take a cultural day at the museum. Phil decides to help Andy create an elaborated video for his girlfriend's anniversary.

eps.name: Las Vegas
eps.desc:
The adults take a trip to Vegas in which Jay tries to obtain the best room. Claire develops a gambling addiction, while Cam attends at Mitch'ex bachelor party. Gloria tries to hide a female version of the dog Butler. Phil auditions to be a magician.
Absent: Sarah Hyland as Haley, Ariel Winter as Alex, Nolan Gould as Luke, Rico Rodriguez as Manny, and Aubrey Anderson-Emmons as Lily

eps.name: A Hard Jay's Night
eps.desc: Mitch struggles to hide his genunine feelings about an unflattering wedding topper Cam's father made; Phil tries to help Gloria sell the apartment she had before Jay but they get sidetracked at a salon; Jay wants to host a nice family evening.

eps.name: Australia
eps.desc: The family travels to Australia as Phil tries to furfill his mother's wish for him to visit the country where he was conceived. Unfortunately, Phil's attempts to embrace his native land are met by a lot of rejection, while Jay and Claire let work eat into vacation time, and Mitch and Cam get reacquainted with an old friend (Rhys Darby).

eps.name: Sleeper
eps.desc: Phil fails at his one task to stay home and wait for the repairman, forcing him to tell an elaborate lie to hide the truth from Claire, but the stress is more than he can physically handle. Meanwhile, Gloria is obsessing over the family portrait she is responsible for organizing this year. Claire accuses Cam of being too snobby to use her girls' hand-me-downs, and Jay secretly enters Stella in a dog show.

eps.name: Message Received
eps.desc: Jay, Gloria and Manny challenge each other to step through their comfort zone. Mitch and Cam's wedding is getting too big and costly so they resort to selling a couple of their prized possessions, and the kids play a joke on Phil and Claire.

eps.name: The Wedding (Part 1)
eps.desc: Cam and Mitchell's wedding arrives, but their big day gets questioned when things go wrong. Gloria and Jay give relationship advice's to Cam's parents, and things take turn for the unexpected. Phil and Claire get to know the kids better and Haley puts herself in the middle of a relationship breakout.

eps.name: The Wedding (Part 2)
eps.desc: Cam and Mitchell's wedding day has finally arrived.
